luxury-garden-kusnacht.title: Luxury Garden Transformation
luxury-garden-kusnacht.description: A full garden redesign that created a calm, premium outdoor living experience.
luxury-garden-kusnacht.overview: We transformed an outdated garden into a cohesive outdoor space with new planting, stone elements, and lighting that highlights the architecture and greenery.
luxury-garden-kusnacht.challenge: The site had uneven levels, limited usable space, and an inconsistent planting scheme that didn’t provide structure throughout the year.
luxury-garden-kusnacht.solution: We introduced a clear layout with high-quality stonework, layered planting for all seasons, and subtle lighting to extend usability into the evening.

steps.description: We created a layout with circulation paths, planting zones and material selections.

steps.title: Construction
steps.description: We executed earthworks, stonework and drainage with clean, durable detailing.

steps.title: Planting & finishing
steps.description: We installed structured planting and added lighting for a refined final look.

villa-terrace-thalwil.title: Villa Terrace & Stone Work
villa-terrace-thalwil.description: A terrace upgrade designed for durability, comfort and a clean, modern look.
villa-terrace-thalwil.overview: We renewed the terrace and surrounding edges, adding natural stone accents and improving transitions between indoor and outdoor spaces.
villa-terrace-thalwil.challenge: Existing surfaces were aging and uneven, with poor detailing around edges and drainage points.
villa-terrace-thalwil.solution: We rebuilt the terrace with precise levels, improved water handling, and added stone features that match the home’s character.

residential-maintenance.title: Year-Round Garden Care
residential-maintenance.description: Seasonal maintenance that keeps the garden tidy, healthy and consistent.
residential-maintenance.overview: We provide structured maintenance across all seasons—from pruning and lawn care to bed renewal—so the garden stays attractive year-round.
residential-maintenance.challenge: Growth was unmanaged and seasonal tasks were inconsistent, leading to uneven plant health and a messy appearance.
residential-maintenance.solution: We implemented a recurring schedule and clear standards for pruning, lawn treatment and planting care to keep everything balanced.

property-full-service.solution: We introduced a full-service plan with clear responsibilities, scheduled visits and high-quality execution across all touchpoints.

natural-stone-pathway.title: Natural Stone Pathway
natural-stone-pathway.description: A crafted pathway that improves access and complements the garden.
natural-stone-pathway.overview: We designed and built a natural stone path that feels timeless, fits the site, and provides safe, comfortable movement through the garden.
natural-stone-pathway.challenge: The existing route was unclear and became slippery in wet conditions, with poor integration into the planting.
natural-stone-pathway.solution: We created a stable base, selected suitable stone, and integrated the edges into planting for a natural, coherent look.

modern-landscape-design.description: A contemporary redesign with functional zones and clean visual structure.
modern-landscape-design.overview: We created a modern garden concept with defined zones for dining, relaxing and planting—balancing design with daily practicality.

modern-landscape-design.solution: We introduced clean lines, durable surfaces, and a planting scheme that is contemporary yet easy to care for.
